flawed_nl_solution:
The lawyer worked 50*2=<<50*2=100>>100 hours out of court
So he worked 100+50=<<100+50=105>>105 hours total
That means the hourly time cost 105*100=$<<105*100=10500>>10500
Adding the upfront cost it was 10500+1000=$<<10500+1000=11500>>11500
His brother paid half so he paid 11500/2=$<<11500/2=5750>>5750
#### 5750

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
